operations.description: Returns the list of scraped reviews from Apify

tql.tql:
SELECT rating, title, content, author, date FROM apify_v2.get_items_in_task_last_run_dataset
  WHERE actorTaskId="wbW84AN7b8AtEFtEZ"
  AND status='SUCCEEDED'

operations.description: Scrapes the amazon reviews from a given url in environment variables

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The amazon product review url to start at

operations.description: Creates a fresh google sheet to store the scraped reviews

tql.tql:
SELECT spreadsheetId, spreadsheetUrl FROM google_sheets.create_sheet
  WHERE $body.properties.title=@name

operations.description: Copies the values from the scraper over to a sheet
Creates a new sheet to populate the scraped reviews onto and returns the url.

appSettings.name: url
appSettings.description: Your amazon review start url. This should be the one you find after clicking "See all X reviews" and contain "/product-reviews/" in the url.

v2.description: An app that scrapes Amazon reviews with Apify to Google Sheets.
